https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jE2b7aojjGkLdzPZFbseyeBoMRD.jpg The story of a man who murdered thirty-two people, gained power, and then got afraid because too many people wanted to kill him. One August morning, he disappeared. For fifteen years, everyone believed him dead. A Quiet Life
